weekly_top_story.headline: FDA Suspends Valneva’s Chikungunya Vaccine License Over Serious Adverse Events
weekly_top_story.summary: The FDA has suspended the license of Valneva’s chikungunya vaccine after reports of serious side effects, highlighting ongoing challenges in vaccine safety monitoring.

stories.headline: Boston Scientific Recalls Carotid Wallstent Monorail Endoprosthesis Over Injury Risk
stories.summary: Boston Scientific issued a recall for its vascular stent due to a manufacturing defect that may cause resistance when withdrawing the device, posing patient injury risk.

stories.headline: FDA Advisory Panel to Meet August 25 on Hospital Outpatient Payment Classification
stories.summary: CMS Advisory Panel on Hospital Outpatient Payment will convene to advise on the clinical integrity of Ambulatory Payment Classification groups, impacting reimbursement policies.
